text: Shameful Secrets, also known as Going Underground, is an American television movie. It was aired on ABC on October 10, 1993. It is about a child custody battle between Maryanne Walker-Tate (played by Joanna Kerns) and her abusive husband Daniel Tate (played by Tim Matheson). == References == Category:1993 movies Category:1990s drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American television movies Category:Movies about domestic violence
title: Shameful Secrets
